siya sinhala onli meheyumata pera amathya wirawansha wisin pana powanu labu meheyum gananawak wiya.in dawantha pracharayak lada ek meheyumak wuye ohuge suprasiddha maranthika upawasa meheyumayi.eya, siyallan danna paridi wira kawyayak ho shokanthayak nowi jonsan and gonsan wargaye komadiyak bawata pathwa kelawara wuwada ema samastha siduwima thula,lankawe siwil yuddhaya sambandhawa eksath jathinge sanwidhanaya wisin pathkala thripudgala kamituwata erehi pradhana bhumikawa ragapana ladde amathya wirawansha wisini.ratama bala sitiye wirawansha desaya.polis marga badhaka perala damamin,deshadrohi polis niladharinta tharjanaya karamin,eksath jathinge doratuwa asabada sita ban ki muna ta erehi wahasi bas dodamin sampurna siduwimehi awadhanaya thama wetha yomukaraganu was he kriya kaleya.
